statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, address FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE first_name = 'Alice' OR first_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY email;
SELECT id, first_name FROM employee_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT id, first_name, address FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employee_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT employee_profiles.first_name, employee_profiles.last_name, contact_information.emergency_contact_name FROM employee_profiles JOIN contact_information ON employee_profiles.id = contact_information.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_employee_profiles;
SELECT full_name, job_title, department FROM remote_employee_profiles ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM remote_employee_profiles WHERE location='New York';
SELECT full_name, contact_number FROM remote_employee_profiles WHERE job_title='Manager';
SELECT employee_id, full_name, location FROM remote_employee_profiles ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_employee_profiles WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT full_name, job_title, location FROM remote_employee_profiles WHERE job_title = 'Manager' AND location = 'New York';

SELECT p.full_name, c.email, n.note_text FROM remote_employee_profiles p JOIN employee_contacts c ON p.employee_id = c.employee_id JOIN profile_notes n ON p.employee_id = n.employee_id WHERE p.department = 'Sales';

SELECT p.full_name, c.phone_number, n.note_date FROM remote_employee_profiles p JOIN employee_contacts c ON p.employee_id = c.employee_id JOIN profile_notes n ON p.employee_id = n.employee_id WHERE p.location = 'Los Angeles';

SELECT p.full_name, c.address, n.note_text FROM remote_employee_profiles p JOIN employee_contacts c ON p.employee_id = c.employee_id JOIN profile_notes n ON p.employee_id = n.employee_id WHERE p.job_title = 'Analyst';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM EmployeeProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM AddressDetails WHERE city = 'New York';

SELECT EmployeeProfiles.first_name, DepartmentInfo.department_name FROM EmployeeProfiles INNER JOIN EmployeeDepartment ON EmployeeProfiles.employee_id = EmployeeDepartment.employee_id INNER JOIN DepartmentInfo ON EmployeeDepartment.department_id = DepartmentInfo.department_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, phone_number FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT emp.employee_id, dep.department_name FROM EmployeeProfiles emp JOIN EmployeeDepartment emp_dep ON emp.employee_id = emp_dep.employee_id JOIN DepartmentInfo dep ON emp_dep.department_id = dep.department_id;
SELECT emp.first_name, ad.city, ad.state FROM EmployeeProfiles emp JOIN AddressDetails ad ON emp.employee_id = ad.employee_id WHERE ad.state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT employee_id, city, state FROM addresses ORDER BY state, city DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, r.role_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_roles er ON e.employee_id = er.employee_id JOIN roles r ON er.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(er.role_id) AS role_count FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employee_roles er ON d.department_id = er.role_id GROUP BY d.department_name ORDER BY role_count DESC;
